ch.codebulb.crudfaces.service

Class CrudServiceMocked<T extends CrudIdentifiable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudfaces.service.CrudService<T>
      • ch.codebulb.crudfaces.service.CrudServiceMocked<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class CrudServiceMocked<T extends CrudIdentifiable>
extends CrudService<T>

    A mocked CrudService implementation which stores entities in a HashMap rather than persisting them in an actual persistence storage.

    Whilst of no use in a real-world production environment, this class might come in handy if you want to try something out without having a proper database / persistence configuration set up. You may then use a CrudServiceMocked implementation as e.g. a @SessionScoped bean, and later change to a true CrudService without any interface changes.

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Nicolas Hofstetter (codebulb.ch)
    See Also:
